inclusion.criterion: Pre-menopausal women between the ages of 18-50
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Women with either natural growth/distribution of pubic hair or complete removal of pubic hair through a reversible process.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Women who do not feel they have urinary or vaginal health problems and are not seeking care for these issues
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women must be willing and able to complete study documentation and study procedures.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hair has been removed through an irreversible process like laser or electrolysis
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patient feels they have bothersome urinary or pelvic floor conditions for which they are seeking care (for example: vaginal prolapse, frequent urinary incontinence, chronic pelvic pain, bladder pain)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patient plans on having any type of surgery in the next 2 months (due to likely antibiotic use)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient has a history of a transplant and is on immunosuppression
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patient has cancer for which she is currently getting chemotherapy or radiation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Currently taking or has taken antibiotics in the last 7 days for any reason
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patient has symptoms of a urinary tract or vaginal infection or is found on exam or culture to have a urinary tract infection or vaginal infection
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: 62 yo male with hx of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter with multiple prior admissions for UTIs, altered mental status, and urosepsis. Non-obstructing stone in the L ureter.
